title: Display — Vriend over Vijand
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164520im_/http:/typophile.com/files/9789401406956_0_5428.jpg)

Font: 

 Edwardian 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164520/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content: It looks like a manually emboldened **[Edwardian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164520/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Edwardian%20Medium%20Plain%20-%20Regular&fid=7113ef1b14f2575f7a8a19b07dc051e9&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=VRIEND%20OVER%20VIJAND&wrap=2)** by Colin Brignall [1983] available from Letraset, ITC, Linotype
